jcr:content.jcr:description: We’ve put together the Altra Film Fest -- a collection of fun inspirational stories from the Altra family. Check them out here and get inspired for your run!
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra Watch Party

text_copy_copy_copy_.text: We're running a series of inpirational stories. With races being cancelled and being stuck inside more than we'd like, we've put together the Altra Film Fest -- a collection of fun inspirational stories from the Altra family.

overlayImage.altText: Balance, a film about the western states 100

text_1740780092_copy.text: A short documentary following 3 unique #TeamAltra Ultrarunners in their pursuit of finishing one of the most prestigious races in the sport, Western States Endurance Run, while balancing careers, families, and their own personal running goals.

overlayImage.altText: The Double a ultra marathon film

text_1740780092.text: From the heat, speed and competition at the Western States 100 to the high altitude, steep climbs and severe weather of the Hardrock Hundred 100. For most, even attempting these two high profile 100-mile races is a lifetime achievement.

text.text: Altra Running is pleased to present "Failure" a short film featuring Team Altra Elite Zach Bitter and the universally experienced harsh reality that sometimes, success isn't in the cards and failure must be thought of as "a guide to what your next step is or what direction to head."

text_copy.text: 4 historic 100-mile races, 3 months, 1 athlete. Team Altra Elite, Gediminas Grinius, takes on the Grand Slam of Ultrarunning and leaves his mark on the US trail running scene.

text_copy_copy.text: A curated selection of Western States videos.

overlayImage.altText: A film about the Wasatch 100 Miler

text_copy_copy_copy.text: A short documentary following Altra Red Team Athlete, Ben Light, in his pursuit of finishing 2 epic endurance races, the Wasatch 100 Miler and the Tahoe 200 Mile Endurance Run...back to back!

text_copy_copy_copy_.text: SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE STORIES
